marklogic.body:
I wont agree with everything you're saying, but you certainly have some good points. D Wade and LBJ just plain ole seem uninterested in playing some games and as a result, the rest of the team follows suit. In the mean time, Spoelstra looks-on emotionless as if he has no clue that the team is playing without (even an ounce of) passion. Eric Spoelstra is just not a championship caliber coach, and this team will continue to struggle because of that fact alone! I personally don't think the Heat will even make it to the finals this year.
If the Heat really want to win a championship with this team they are gonna have to get rid of Spo!...PERIOD!...any real coach would not allow Wade and James to take games Off at their liberty.
